data.page_content_editor:
Our Philosophy: “Your Crew, Our Care”

We  like  to  be  your  ‘window’  to  the  crew  market  in  the  Philippines  and  customize  our  operations  to suit your needs. What does this mean in real life:

  •  Philippine Overseas Employment Agency (POEA-125-SB-092012-R) valid until Sept 20, 2016
  • ISO 2009 for renewal in 2012 (including MLC-2006 accreditation)
  • Embassies
    • USA
    • Germany
  • Licensing agent Liberian Flagstate
